hero.title: Maison du Chocolat
hero.description: Where tradition meets artistry. Every piece is a masterwork, handcrafted from the world's finest cacao.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: For over a century, our family has been dedicated to the art of chocolate making. What began as a small atelier in the heart of Paris has grown into a celebrated maison, yet our philosophy remains unchanged.
story.p2: We source the finest cacao beans from single-origin estates across Ecuador, Madagascar, and Venezuela. Each batch is roasted, ground, and tempered by hand, preserving the unique terroir of every harvest.

collection.subtitle: Our Creations
collection.title: The Collection
collection.description: Each piece is a testament to our master chocolatiers' dedication to perfection, crafted from ethically sourced cacao.

footer.description: Handcrafted with passion since 1897. Every piece tells a story of dedication, tradition, and the finest ingredients.
